content.prompt: The expansion of suffrage to most adult White men by the 1820s and 1830s most directly contributed to the

choices.label: emergence of political rallies and events to encourage people to vote for particular parties
increase in the autonomy of state legislatures
expansion of labor union activism that demanded better conditions for workers
establishment of representative democracy through the United States Constitution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
